subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon screeched off the course at the first turn on the 11-turn, 2.45-mile road course at Watkins Glen International, allowing Tony Stewart to storm into the lead.
snippet: Jeff Gordon screeched off the course at the first turn on the 11-turn, 2.45-mile road course at Watkins Glen International, allowing Tony Stewart to storm into the lead.
